Author: alexvilis
Title: *[ANN ICO PRESALE]* GSC Platform - Supply Chain Solutions
Body: Blockchain Resolves Uncertainty in the Supply Chain  Genesis Supply Chain Platform (GSCP) is a supply chain technology startup dedicated to improving the purchasing experience for procurement in the aviation industry. GSCP is launching GSC Aviation — a platform that allows information to quickly flow from suppliers to purchasers while adding a layer of trust utilizing blockchain technology and two-way supplier reviews. This platform network is unique in the aviation industry which relies on a complex supply system with more parts than most other industries. https://medium.com/@gscaviationcm/blockchain-resolves-uncertainty-in-the-supply-chain-9d015b580251

Author: zerkalisz
Title: *[ANN ICO PRESALE]* GSC Platform - Supply Chain Solutions
Body: GSCP Joins ETC Labs Incubator Pilot, Pitches at Launch Event  The Genesis Supply Chain Platform Team is elated to announce that we have been chosen to participate in the ETC Labs Incubator Pilot program. GSCP was one of six startups out of over one hundred and twenty to apply to the program which provides office space, advice, support, investment and access to the rich Ethereum Classic development and entrepreneurial community. Projects were chosen based largely on “technical capabilities of the team and their ability to build on the ETC blockchain” according to ETC Labs Director of Operations and Programs, Elizabeth Kukka. Classic is a platform that has seen growth and investment recently and the formation of ETC Labs is a sign of the strength of the platform and its growth potential as a platform. Classic affords GSCP and its users all of the benefits of the Ethereum ecosystem with the added measure of enhanced immutability inherent with Classic. https://medium.com/@gscplatform/gscp-joins-etc-labs-incubator-pilot-pitches-at-launch-event-6866dfa845d

Author: EMS-007
Title: *[ANN ICO PRESALE]* GSC Platform - Supply Chain Solutions
Body: Below  are samples of general aviation issues which  i think can be simply resolved by GSC by integration the Aeronautical system along Blockchain Technology.  1. Most planes are, on the average, 45 years old.  How do you keep them updated and upgraded cost effectively? 2. How do we make sure pilot’s voices are heard on issues such as third-class medical requirements, fuel taxes, changes in how ATC is handled and more? 3. What are ways to draw people back to the airports? 4. What are some of the issues, like noise pollution, and how can they be addressed to help make the airports a valued part of local communities? 5. What does the path look like for becoming ADS-B compliant by 2020, including privacy for aircraft owners? 6. How are drones and UAVs going to be incorporated into the National Airspace System?  And these excludes all major issues along old Aviation system that really needs to be addressed in this new  era!

Author: gerymakgyaer
Title: *[ANN ICO PRESALE]* GSC Platform - Supply Chain Solutions
Body: What problems does GSC Aviation solve?   The Aviation Industry requires efficiency in a supply system when it comes to manufacturing, installing, maintaining, repairing and overhauling parts. The current system is inefficient, it relies on paper based systems, and has many unintegrated information silos.  Genesis Supply Chain (GSC) Aviation will use Blockchain technology to ensure buyers and sellers related to the aviation supply part industry benefit from a well-organized system which makes their very stressful lives, much more comfortable.  There are many problems GSC helps to solve for both the buyers and suppliers. However, the three listed below are the most severe issues which GSC promises to fix. https://medium.com/@gscaviationcm/what-problems-does-gsc-aviation-solve-9c4bee6744c7

Author: GSC Platform SAS
Title: *[ANN ICO PRESALE]* GSC Platform - Supply Chain Solutions
Body: GSC Platform  Genesis Supply Chain Platform is a French based Company launching GSC Platform  A Supply Chain Solution for the Aeronautical Industry, a trillion dollar industry world wide. Global-Aeronautics-Report     Click Link Below To Participate  - PRE SALE NOW LIVE -    Important Links  WEBSITE - WHITEPAPER - TELEGRAM    Watch CEO and Founder, Maxime Legros, explaining GSC Aviation, and what we are looking to achieve in the aviation industry.   Main Issues  A lot of aeronautical equipment has potential or planned obsolescence, meaning it’s possible to install them on aircraft for a certain period of time before they must be sent in for testing, for example, hydro static tests for a fire extinguisher. Continuing Airworthiness Management Organizations (CAMOs), - organizations responsible for aircraft airworthiness monitoring for MROs and Airlines can forget or lose information on the maintenance schedule requirements of equipment because documentary traceability is often cumbersome at the administrative level. This can jeopardize the safety of flights with parts that remain on aircraft when they must be filed for repair/inspection or overhaul.  Our Solutions  The GSC Aviation system will aim to gather all this information and secure it in the Blockchain to be able to alert its MRO, Airlines and CAMO customers on the parts to be deposited on each aircraft concerned. In addition, this information will be used by purchasing/logistics departments who will be aware of the potential of the parts they order, which will avoid ordering a piece at the end of its life cycle from a supplier and thus wasting time and money with unnecessary purchases.    Our platform includes three key features:  • By replacing slow, manual, and repetitive processes, mostly still relying entirely on paper, such as billing and shipping, for faster, digital ones, benefiting from a wide range of smart contracts – electronic agreements that self-execute according to predefined rules – that virtually guarantee the performance of often unknown suppliers, our solution allows companies to bypass conventional ways of establishing trust and finding new, more innovative, more responsive suppliers, while also saving substantial time and money.  • Based on blockchain technology, the secure, tamper-proof, instantly available, and highly relevant information in GSC Aviation database will provide perfect traceability, as well as the management of planned obsolescence, of all available equipment and offer a total security guarantee for all MRO, airlines, and CAMO customers, thus substantially reducing the risk of accidents due to related human error.  • Due to the immutable, transparent, and auditable features of blockchain technology, the GSC Aviation might be an answer to the pressure for increasingly more effective fraud detection processes. Our goal is to provide aeronautical professionals quality resources, the security of blockchain technology, and efficient purchasing protocols to enable economies of scale for aerospace industry players by optimising the supply chain as a whole.                FIND US @  Twitter English https://twitter.com/GSCPlatform  Facebook https://www.facebook.com/GSCPlatform  Youtube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC1Sh6OUnImZOajl6_Imzl9w  Reddit https://www.reddit.com/r/GSCPlatform/  Medium https://medium.com/@gscplatform   For any professional questions about the aeronautical supply chain, please contact: m.legros@gscplatform.io  For partnership inquiries please contact us at: partnership@gscplatform.io  For all other inquiries, do not hesitate to contact us at: contact@gscplatform.io   Bounty Program managed by @LoveCrypto - Telegram Wapinter

Author: GSC Platform SAS
Title: *[ANN ICO PRESALE]* GSC Platform - Supply Chain Solutions
Body: The majority of Blockchain projects dealing with supply chain solutions are focused on one particular industry such as Walmart etc.. or on a specific step of the supply chain process like CargoX, OriginTrail etc. With GSC Platform we will bring solutions in major industries such as Aviation, Automotive or Rail.  We will bring an end to end BC solution from the purchaser's need to the delivery of the goods : Suppliers discovery, Integration of a new supplier to their portfolio, Procurement Plannification, RFQ Module, Communication Tools to improve relationship between buyer and suppliers, Supplier performance tracking (KPI's) for the buyers. Payments in GSCP can be made for subscribers to the platform enabling a 20% discount on the fees. Platform users will also be able to settle their transactions in GSCP to take advantage of benefits that tokens offer (speed of settlement, low fees for international payments, 24 hour access, no 3rd party involvement and smart contracts) - This will all be managed through our GSC Aviation supply chain platform.  Then we will create our first pure Blockchain service -GSC Aviation Traceability- to reduce the aviation risk of accidents by tracing all Aircraft critical parts in our Blockchain from manufacturing to the end life of the part - This will provide an instant, secure, immutable information of each part to Aviation supply chain participants and give the possibility to purchasing depts of our users to anticipate their procurement needs being more focus on value added tasks for their company like finding new suppliers for multisourcing, making contracts, negotiation and sending annual pulsed PO (Purchase Orders). Annual pulsed PO = to deal with JIT (Just In Time) needs and reduce inventory and delivery costs.

Author: Valados
Title: *[ANN ICO PRESALE]* GSC Platform - Supply Chain Solutions
Body: That's not nice buddy. Please do some research and you will see this is a completely legit project. Come into our telegram for a chat if you aren't convinced

Author: dzkrb
Title: *[ANN ICO PRESALE]* GSC Platform - Supply Chain Solutions
Body: I would like to clarify. Do you offer a program for accounting for technical repairs or do you offer access to a database with components for aviation? I have already heard about the kind of programs. Are you sure that there are no such programs in the airlines?

Author: GSC Platform SAS
Title: *[ANN ICO PRESALE]* GSC Platform - Supply Chain Solutions
Body: We offer access to the database with components for aviation and much more through the platform. Obviously there is competition in the regular business such as Aerobay, Partsbase, Locatory which offer inventory/capability list to potential purchasers but they are only focused on the RFQ (Request For Quotation) module so nothing about Supplier's discovery, suppliers/purchasers ratings and supplier performance tracking which leads to improve the whole process of the purchasers. Furthermore GSC Platform will provide technological solutions through our BC. And finally we will not only provide our services in the Aviation Industry such as all competitors we can have but also in Automative, Rail, Energy, Pharmaceutical etc. Everywhere there are purchasing dept which reprensent 40 to 80% of every companies turnover, so it's one of the most important departments of a company and improvements in this department will offer the possibility of a higher margin and thus more profit for the company. Sorry for the long answer

Author: omar hashim
Title: *[ANN ICO PRESALE]* GSC Platform - Supply Chain Solutions
Body: The GSC platform provides each buyer with a dashboard listing information about the supplier and their past collaborations. This technical and easy-to-use tool for the buyer allows them to save time and concentrate on strategic purchases and tasks with higher added value for his company.

Author: m_nikiforov
Title: *[ANN ICO PRESALE]* GSC Platform - Supply Chain Solutions
Body: tell me, where can I find out about the plans for the development of the project? where can I see your road map in its expanded form?

Author: coinbitcoin91
Title: *[ANN ICO PRESALE]* GSC Platform - Supply Chain Solutions
Body: An attractive idea of the project, which you decided to combine with the crypto-currencies. Aviation and crypto, this is a new one that has not yet been met on my way, but I can say that you have no competition for now, it gives a chance for a good move. And you do not have information about the development team, where can I get acquainted with this?

Author: susunyonya
Title: *[ANN ICO PRESALE]* GSC Platform - Supply Chain Solutions
Body: I see the arrangement of activities from the sale of coins is very neat with some bonuses offered, I also see the total supply of coins is not too much, what is the minimum investment limit?
